title: Hyperlink Builder Title Inconsistent with Settings
description: The title of the hyperlink builder keeps changing with settings, causing confusion.
OB: When I click on 'OK' and then reopen the hyperlink builder, the actual result is that its title becomes 'www.actuate.com'.
EB: I expected the title of the hyperlink builder to remain consistent as 'Hyperlink Options' regardless of the settings or actions performed.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Open the hyperlink builder.
2. Make changes to the settings, if necessary.
3. Click on 'OK'.
4. Close the hyperlink builder.
5. Reopen the hyperlink builder.
